body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Petersburg National Battlefield is open every day of the year except for Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Years. Visitor Center and Contact Stations hours of operation are 9:00 am - 5:00 pm. Grounds open at 8:00 am.Grant's Headquarter's at City Point (804) 458-9504Parking lot gate closes at 5:00 pm but grounds remain open until dusk.Eastern Front (804) 732-3531 ext.200Entrance gate opens at 8:00 am and closes at 8:00 pm.Five Forks Battlefield (804) 469-4093Gate to Visitor Contact Station parking lot opens at 8:00 am and closes at 5:00 pm. Driving tour parking areas close at dusk.Poplar Grove National Cemetery(804) 732-3531Grounds open at 8:00 am and close at dusk.Weather related closures can be determined by dialing the park's main telephone number at (804) 732-3531 and then pressing "9".
